title: Unto Caesar
description: As a prefect of Rome, his allegiance belongs to Caesar; as a Christian, his life belongs to God. Amidst the tyranny and treachery of a half-crazed emperor's reign, Taurus Antinor seeks to remains true to his oath to Caesar and to God. When offered the glory of a kingdom and the love of a woman, this powerful magistrate sacrifices all for the sake of a Galilean upon a cross.
author: Emmuska Orczy
